install.name: Content - HD Gfont
install.author: Hyde-Design
install.description: HD-Gfonts is a simple plugin that allows you to replace the standard fonts of your headings with a wider range of over 200 fonts and font variations from the Google Font Directory.

param.name: font-face-1
param.label: Google Font

option.value: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.option: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.name: font-class-1
param.label: Class
param.description: The class the font should be applied to (eg. H1 or .componentheading). Use a comma to seperate if applying to more than one class (eg. H1, H2, H3).

param.name: font-css-1
param.label: Additional CSS
param.description: Add additional CSS here (eg. font-size: 20px). Use a semi-colon to seperate if applying more than one CSS rule (eg. font-size:20px; color: red).

param.name: @spacer_one
param.default: Enable the parameters below to embed more than one Google Font. It is recommended to keep the ammount of fonts enabled to a minimum to reduce page load speed.

param.name: use_second
param.label: Enable Second Font?
param.description: Select to enable a second Google Font.

param.name: font-face-2
param.label: Google Font

option.value: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.option: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.name: font-class-2
param.label: Class
param.description: The class the second font should be applied to (eg. H1 or .componentheading)

param.name: use_third
param.label: Enable Third Font?
param.description: Select to enable a third Google Font.

param.name: font-face-3
param.label: Google Font

option.value: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.option: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.name: font-class-3
param.label: Class
param.description: The class the third font should be applied to (eg. H1 or .componentheading)

param.name: use_fourth
param.label: Enable Fourth Font?
param.description: Select to enable a fourth Google Font.

param.name: font-face-4
param.label: Google Font

option.value: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.option: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.name: font-class-4
param.label: Class
param.description: The class the fourth font should be applied to (eg. H1 or .componentheading)

param.name: use_fifth
param.label: Enable Fifth Font?
param.description: Select to enable a fifth Google Font.

param.name: font-face-5
param.label: Google Font

option.value: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.option: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT Italic

param.name: font-class-5
param.label: Class
param.description: The class the fifth font should be applied to (eg. H1 or .componentheading)
